title: Sampler, 1814
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, running (pattern darning), hollie point needle lace (loop and twist and passive return) on plain weave foundation
description: Seventeen darning crosses, central patch, four squares with needle lace.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1814.
1814. Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, running (pattern darning), hollie point needle lace (loop and twist and passive return) on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-250.
